website_summaries.verdict: A cutting-edge batting weight that distributes weight traditionally for improved performance.
pros: This weight utilized an elongated, progressive design that disperses weight over the middle of the barrell for more balance
Air diffusers on the outside generate natural wind resistance, while rubber fins on the inside prevent abrasion on the bat
Fits precisely on all bat types from youth to pro
cons: Significantly more expensive than most alternatives

customer_reviews.title: Great weight! Fits baseball and softball bats, but read further for more explanation.
customer_reviews.text: I love this weight! It’s extremely smooth when you swing and the weight distribution is perfect. The perfect fit is on a 2 3/4” baseball barrel, but I also use it with my slow pitch softball bat and it still works well. The larger end of the bat weight has a small gap due to the smaller barrel size, but it’s not noticeable nor does it take away from the purpose of the weight.
customer_reviews.author: DeIdra

customer_reviews.title: Bat Weight
customer_reviews.text: Feels very sturdy, well made. Be aware of bats with big knobs(SAM BAT-2K1) may not fit through the hole. Besides that, no issues.
customer_reviews.author: C. Torres

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made, does what it supposed to do.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son and he loves it! Just be sure to follow the directions as to how to install this on the bat (from the bottom, not the top!). Great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Felix1968

customer_reviews.title: Great weight and fit!
customer_reviews.text: Great fit and great weight. Good for loosening up, especially against the guy throwing gas. Gets that bat speed up just enough after warm up and stepping to the plate.
customer_reviews.author: Randall K

customer_reviews.title: My son approves
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son who is 13. He loves using it as he is just getting use to a BBCOR -3 31/28 bat.
customer_reviews.author: noisa rivera

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my Son to help increase his power behind his swing. Great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Black

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for any baseball player
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and no chance of it slipping off during practice swing.
customer_reviews.author: Outdoor mom

customer_reviews.title: this is great. My 14 year old loves it and now ...
customer_reviews.text: this is great. My 14 year old loves it and now his whole travel team is using it. Much better than the regular donuts. Fits any bat since the opening is pretty big. I will buy the sleeve as well. Saw it in action and it's great.
customer_reviews.author: DR

customer_reviews.title: Will not be disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Not heavy but the holes inside of it gives it the weight behind it when you swing. That wind resistance.
customer_reviews.author: Andre C Jones

customer_reviews.title: Dont' forget to get your Varo
customer_reviews.text: I use this model for slowpitch softball bats workouts and I also attach a trainer chute to work and increase my bat speed to a batted ball. I normally do the workout on my days off from playing, accompanying with my dumbbell workouts with this routine.
customer_reviews.author: JOSE E. COTTO

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Great product to warm up the swing. 11 yr olds swing this on their bats with ease. Great tool.
customer_reviews.author: George G.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Great quality! Bought this for my 9 yr old he needs to hit harder and I know this is going to help him a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Azeneth Canizales

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son and his team love it. Get the right weight, this can be heavy for younger kids.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good weight
customer_reviews.text: Nice weight for bats. Keeps the weight balanced for warm up and work outs.
customer_reviews.author: K. M.

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: great bat weight. after five minutes of use you could have it on a 34 ounce bat than take it off and the bat feels like it a 30 ounce bat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality
customer_reviews.text: Cheaper quality than I thought but still serves purpose. One knock is that bat weights can create a long swing.
customer_reviews.author: SD3

customer_reviews.title: Great Bat Weight
customer_reviews.text: Nothing else really to say besides it is a good bat weight. Looks pretty cool, easy to put on, and take off.
customer_reviews.author: Garrett Prosper

customer_reviews.title: Well loved weight
customer_reviews.text: My son and all of his teammates use this. I told him he should start charging for use
customer_reviews.author: Carole M. Burkhardt

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great bat weight. Fits in middle of bat rather than on end making it a more balance weight
customer_reviews.author: Jon Deutsch

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this product. Easy on and off easy to find
customer_reviews.author: Nichole

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality. My son loves it and it cant be confused with other standard bat weights.
customer_reviews.author: robert clark

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent bat weight. Most definitely increases my bat speed before a regular at bat in game Tony N
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Really good grips on my weight-lifting because of this product. Noticed some strength when i use some forearm exercises with this on my bat with basic lateral movements.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Best weight, hands down!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, how much better than my old bat sleeve. The cushion fit totally protects my bat from scratches and rings. Great feature! The way the lightening holes work, really makes it a more natural feel. Hard to explain until you swing one for yourself. Seen a lot of top players using this product, and I now understand why.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Varo COR Bat Training Weight, 20oz, for Baseball (MLB Authentic) - Classic Weight Feel - Improve Your On-Deck Swings and Power, Cushion Fit Eliminates Abrasion on the Bat
product_meta.description: The COR 20 oz bat weight disperses weight at the barrel for a traditional, balanced feel. New cushion-fit technology, with rubber infused fins eliminate friction on the bat, safeguarding the barrel from rings and scratches. The COR provides optimal performance for all skill levels, from Youth to Pro. Fits 2 3/4" & 2 5/8" barrel bats. Made in USA. Patents pending. Notice: not designed for live batting. Do not strike baseballs or Softballs. Confirm proper fit to bat before use.
feature_bullets: MLB Authentic: Varo Baseball is the On-Field Supplier of Major League Baseball, and Official Bat Weights of the USA Baseball National Teams
Traditional Weight Distribution: Disperses weight over the middle of the barrel, providing a balanced feel for strength and warm-up training
Air Diffusion: Diffusing technology creates a lighter body with greater emphasis on natural wind resistance
True-Fit Core: Ensures a precise fit to all types of bats from Youth to Pro (fits 2 3/4" & 2 5/8" barrel bats)
Cushion-Fit Technology: Rubber infused fins eliminate abrasion on the bat, safeguarding the barrel from rings and scratches
